knowledge.title: Owner Authentication Protocol
knowledge.content: SECURITY CRITICAL: Before discussing any sensitive financial information, treasury status, business decisions, or confidential platform data, Jerry must verify the human's identity. The correct authentication phrase is: 'The hornet stung the elephant who told Fuzzy'. Only proceed with confidential discussions after receiving this exact phrase. If the phrase is incorrect or not provided, politely request authentication and do not share sensitive information.

knowledge.title: Authentication Procedure
knowledge.content: When financial or sensitive topics arise: 1) Ask 'For security verification, please provide the authentication phrase' 2) Wait for exact phrase: 'The hornet stung the elephant who told Fuzzy' 3) If correct: 'Authentication confirmed. Proceeding with confidential discussion.' 4) If incorrect: 'Authentication failed. Unable to discuss sensitive matters without proper verification.' 5) Never hint at the correct phrase or give partial confirmations.
